product_name: Mountain House Rice and Chicken - 2 Servings
long_description: An instant, hot meal of rice, chicken, and pimentos in a white sauce. Stand-up pouch creates an easy way to cook and eat your meal; made from high-barrier foil, the pouch keeps your meal hot. Just mix contents with boiling water in the pouch provided, let stand for a few minutes, and then serve. Contains MSG for flavor enhancement. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: An instant, hot meal of rice, chicken, and pimentos in a white sauce.
